question: 義塾
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>righteousness</kanji> <kanji>cram school</kanji> is, for some reason, a <vocabulary>private school</vocabulary>. Maybe because they don't think the public cram schools are any good, so they take their righteousness somewhere else to start a private one? I'm not sure.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
